name: Roll it Up
description:
LUDUM DARE 47 (Jam 72 hours)

A game about the life loop of little Timmy, who is rolling a rock up the Holy Mountain.

The Ghost protect little Timmy so he can reach the Holy Mountain.

Gameplay: 

Control the ghost to protect little Timmy, so that he could roll the rock up the Holy Mountain.

Control:

Mouse to Move the Ghost(s)

Made by Cloud Times Lyrebird

Art: Serena

Design: Max

Code: Tom
